alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 8:15PM CST until March 02 at 2:48AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Platte River near Agency affecting Buchanan County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Platte River near Agency. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low-lying areas east of Agency begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.9 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Wed Wed 12am 6am 12pm Platte River Agency 20.0 21.6 Tue 7pm 20.7 19.2 17.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
